comments.body: What's up with all this returned anys? What gets returned there?

I suppose these could be `void`, but I saw that a [bunch of methods](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/rangy/index.d.ts#L44-L48) used `any` despite not returning anything, according to [their documentation](https://github.com/timdown/rangy/wiki/Rangy-Selection#properties). Maybe those should be changed as well?
The return type of `getNativeTextRange()` seems to be [well defined](https://github.com/timdown/rangy/wiki/Rangy-Selection#getnativetextrange) for example.

Yeah that should be tightened up a bit. But `getNativeTextRange` isn't part of the Class Applier module, so I'll leave that for a separate PR.

My intention here was to do a first PR of a manageable size to get a feel for the whole process of submitting to DefinitelyTyped, and to do a bigger PR solving all the issues with Rangy after that (there are some other modules that would need to be typed, and some methods like `rangy.init()` are still undefined here). I'm happy to take care of them, just in the next PR ðŸ˜Š
